courses.title: Leadership Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the essential principles of effective leadership and build your leadership foundation.

content.title: What is Leadership?
content.body: Leadership is the ability to influence and guide others toward a common goal. In this lesson we explore the difference between authority and leadership, and discuss the attributes of effective leaders.

content.title: Core Leadership Principles
content.body: This lesson covers principles such as integrity, accountability, empathy, and vision-setting. Practical examples and reflection prompts are included.

content.title: Leading Teams Effectively
content.body: Techniques for building trust, fostering collaboration, and facilitating productive meetings. Includes frameworks for decision-making and delegation.

courses.title: Strategic Communication
courses.description: Learn to communicate with clarity, confidence, and impact in any situation.

content.title: The Fundamentals of Clear Messaging
content.body: How to structure a message for different audiences, the importance of purpose-first communication, and practical templates.

content.title: Active Listening & Feedback
content.body: Explore active listening techniques and delivering feedback using the SBI model. Exercises included.

courses.title: Emotional Intelligence
courses.description: Develop self-awareness, empathy, and social skills for better leadership relationships.

content.title: Self-Awareness
content.body: Understand your emotional triggers, strengths, and areas for growth. This lesson includes reflective prompts and journaling exercises.

content.title: Empathy & Social Skills
content.body: Practice perspective-taking, giving supportive feedback, and fostering inclusive team conversations.

courses.title: Team Leadership Dynamics
courses.description: Build, motivate and lead high-performing teams using practical frameworks.

content.title: Foundations of Team Leadership
content.body: Roles, stages of team development, and setting norms for success.

content.title: Motivation & Delegation
content.body: How to delegate effectively and motivate through purpose and recognition.

courses.title: Strategic Decision Making
courses.description: Develop critical thinking and make better decisions under pressure.

content.title: Decision Frameworks
content.body: Use practical frameworks to analyze options, risks, and trade-offs.

content.title: Scenario Planning
content.body: Run simulations and prepare for uncertainty using scenario techniques.

courses.title: Conflict Resolution
courses.description: Master techniques to resolve conflicts constructively and maintain team harmony.

content.title: Understanding Conflict
content.body: Types of conflict and when to address them.

content.title: Mediation Skills
content.body: Step-by-step mediation and de-escalation techniques.

courses.title: Public Speaking Excellence
courses.description: Gain confidence and presence for public speaking and presentations.

content.title: Structure & Storytelling
content.body: Craft clear openings, core messages, and memorable closes.

content.title: Delivery & Presence
content.body: Voice, pacing, body language and handling nerves.

courses.title: Strategic Time Management
courses.description: Prioritise work and lead with focus using proven time techniques.

content.title: Prioritisation
content.body: Identify high-impact tasks and reduce low-value work.

content.title: Planning Systems
content.body: Use weekly and daily planning to protect focus time.

courses.title: Leading Organizational Change
courses.description: Guide teams through change with empathy and clarity.

content.title: Change Models
content.body: Understand ADKAR, Kotter and practical steps for transformation.

content.title: Communicating Change
content.body: How to create buy-in and reduce resistance.

courses.title: Leadership Mentoring & Coaching
courses.description: Develop coaching habits that unlock team potential.

content.title: Coaching Conversations
content.body: Use powerful questions and active listening to coach growth.

content.title: Setting Development Goals
content.body: Design useful development plans and follow-ups.

courses.title: Leading Innovation & Creativity
courses.description: Build a culture that enables creative problem solving.

content.title: Creative Techniques
content.body: Design thinking, ideation, and rapid prototyping.

content.title: Scaling Ideas
content.body: From pilot to adoption: practical steps to scale experiments.

courses.title: Ethical Leadership & Decision Making
courses.description: Make principled choices and create trust in teams.

content.title: Principles & Frameworks
content.body: Frameworks for ethical decision-making and trade-offs.

content.title: Building Trust
content.body: Practices for transparency, accountability and psychological safety.
